original: ksha ya'i nad sel ba'i sngags /
analyzed: ksha ya'i nad sel ba'i sngags /

original: na mo he tu he ke sv'ah'a /
analyzed: na mo he tu he ke sv'ah'a /

original: lus la nad byung na nad khong skems kyis btab pa bsil yab la chus gtor te lan drug cu rtsa gcig sngags nas de'i lus la g-yabs na nad med par 'gyur /
analyzed: lus la nad byung na nad khong skems kyis btab pa bsil yab la chus gtor te lan drug cu rtsa gcig sngags nas de'i lus la g-yabs na nad med par 'gyur /
translated: If there is an illness in the body, having performed the rite of the inner heat, sprinkle water on a fan and enchant it with the mantra sixty-one times. Then fan the body and the illness will be cured.

original: ksha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: ksha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī for curing consumption is complete.
